overview: A Dark and Comical look at a group of Budz, living in Toronto, who are reunited with a member of the group who spent six months in jail. They face the struggles of breaking out as artists, affording rent and dealing with what the world throws at them while they are the prime suspects in a murder mystery involving a cake. Can they hold it together?
tagline: Even the stickiest of Budz can be broken up.
title: Budz
